SELECT A.GOV_METRIC_ID , A.GOV_METRIC_NM , B.DETAIL_EVAL_ID , REPLACE( REPLACE ( B.DETAIL_EVAL_NM, CHR(13), '' ), CHR(10), ' ' ) DETAIL_EVAL_NM , C.CONCEPT_ID , REPLACE( REPLACE ( C.CONCEPT_NM, CHR(13), '' ), CHR(10), ' ' ) CONCEPT_NM , D.PLAN_ID , REPLACE( REPLACE ( D.PLAN_NM, CHR(13), '' ), CHR(10), ' ' ) PLAN_NM , REPLACE( REPLACE ( D.RESULT, CHR(13), '' ), CHR(10), ' ' ) RESULT , E.SC_DEPT_NM , F.USER_NM AS INSERT_USER_NM , COUNT (1) OVER (PARTITION BY A.YEAR, B.GOV_METRIC_ID) AS GOV_METRIC_CNT , ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY A.YEAR, B.GOV_METRIC_ID ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER, B.SORT_ORDER, C.SORT_ORDER, D.SORT_ORDER) AS GOV_METRIC_INDEX , COUNT (1) OVER (PARTITION BY A.YEAR, B.GOV_METRIC_ID, C.DETAIL_EVAL_ID ) AS DETAIL_EVAL_CNT , ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY A.YEAR, B.GOV_METRIC_ID, C.DETAIL_EVAL_ID ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER, B.SORT_ORDER, C.SORT_ORDER, D.SORT_ORDER) AS DETAIL_EVAL_INDEX , COUNT (1) OVER (PARTITION BY A.YEAR, B.GOV_METRIC_ID, C.DETAIL_EVAL_ID, D.CONCEPT_ID ) AS CONCEPT_CNT , ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY A.YEAR, B.GOV_METRIC_ID, C.DETAIL_EVAL_ID, D.CONCEPT_ID ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER, B.SORT_ORDER, C.SORT_ORDER, D.SORT_ORDER) AS CONCEPT_INDEX FROM GOV_METRIC A INNER JOIN GOV_DETAIL_EVAL_ITEM B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.GOV_METRIC_ID = B.GOV_METRIC_ID INNER JOIN GOV_DETAIL_EVAL_CONCEPT C ON B.YEAR = C.YEAR AND B.DETAIL_EVAL_ID = C.DETAIL_EVAL_ID INNER JOIN GOV_ACTION_PLAN D ON C.YEAR = D.YEAR AND C.CONCEPT_ID = D.CONCEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT E ON A.YEAR = E.YEAR AND A.SC_DEPT_ID = E.SC_DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_USERINFO F ON B.INSERT_USER_ID = F.USER_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear#
A.DELETE_DT IS NULL
A.DELETE_DT IS NOT NULL
START WITH A.UP_METRIC_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR A.YEAR = A.YEAR AND PRIOR A.GOV_METRIC_ID = A.UP_METRIC_ID ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER , B.SORT_ORDER, C.SORT_ORDER, D.SORT_ORDER

SELECT A.GOV_METRIC_ID , A.GOV_METRIC_NM , B.DETAIL_EVAL_ID , B.DETAIL_EVAL_NM , C.CONCEPT_ID , C.CONCEPT_NM , D.PLAN_ID , D.PLAN_NM , D.RESULT , D.SORT_ORDER , E.SC_DEPT_NM , F.USER_NM AS INSERT_USER_NM FROM GOV_METRIC A INNER JOIN GOV_DETAIL_EVAL_ITEM B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.GOV_METRIC_ID = B.GOV_METRIC_ID INNER JOIN GOV_DETAIL_EVAL_CONCEPT C ON B.YEAR = C.YEAR AND B.DETAIL_EVAL_ID = C.DETAIL_EVAL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN GOV_ACTION_PLAN D ON C.YEAR = D.YEAR AND C.CONCEPT_ID = D.CONCEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT E ON A.YEAR = E.YEAR AND A.SC_DEPT_ID = E.SC_DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_USERINFO F ON B.INSERT_USER_ID = F.USER_ID WHERE D.YEAR = #year# AND D.PLAN_ID =#planId#
SELECT 'GP'||LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(PLAN_ID,3,6)),0)+1,5,'0') SEQ FROM GOV_ACTION_PLAN WHERE YEAR = #year#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO GOV_ACTION_PLAN ( YEAR , PLAN_ID , CONCEPT_ID , PLAN_NM , SORT_ORDER , CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #year# , #planId# , #conceptId# , #planNm# , #sortOrder# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE GOV_ACTION_PLAN SET RESULT = #result# WHERE YEAR = #year# AND PLAN_ID = #planId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM GOV_ACTION_PLAN WHERE YEAR = #year# AND PLAN_ID = #planId#
